Interface ISServiceCenter


  • public interface ISServiceCenter
    see ICServiceCenter
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getServiceCenterAPI().store(con, servicecenter, true);

      • importProperties

        boolean importProperties(Connection con,
                       ServiceCenter serviceCenter,
                       boolean activate,
                       boolean isUpdate)
                         throws SQLException
        Imports properties from a file and stores them into database
        Parameters:
        con -
        serviceCenter -
        activate - -(boolean) true if the properties have to be activated directly
        isUpdate - - false if the properties in the database have to be set new
        Returns:
        true, if the properties was successful stored
        Throws:
        SQLException
